text: Devil's Doorway is a 1950 American western movie directed by Anthony Mann and starring Robert Taylor, Louis Calhern, Paula Raymond, Marshall Thompson, James Mitchell, Edgar Buchanan, Spring Byington. It was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1950 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Anthony Mann
title: Devil's Doorway
